author: bago
msg: Renamed james-common-util to james-server-common-util and james-javamail-util to james-server-javamail-util.
At first I chose the serverless name, but ant build uses james-server prefix for every module, so it's easier to use the same name from m2 too.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-1136 : Fixed Flow Control problem due to this change and added test to validate that Flow Control is operating correctly

author: oheger
msg: CONFIGURATION-334: Made handling of parent nodes more consistent.

author: bentmann
msg: o Added integration test to check proper artifact staging (inspired by MINVOKER-40 and MINVOKER-43)
